exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression as defined by WBC < 3, 000 cells/ml at baseline screening.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other acute or chronic medical conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, may increase the risks associated with study participation or HB-adMSC administration.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any abnormal, inexplicable laboratory result with no obvious cause defined.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participation in other interventional research studies. Unwillingness to return for follow-up visits
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and flank pain. Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells in urine culture.
